newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's NLCF buys 25,000T oilseed, passes others.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's NLCF buys 25,000T oilseed, passes others.

text.p: South Korea's National Livestock Cooperatives Federation (NLCF) on Tuesday said it bought 15,000 tonnes of Indian rapeseed meal and 10,000 tonnes of Chinese cottonseed meal.
But the NLCF passed on tenders for 10,000 tonnes of ricebran, 10,000 tonnes of palm meal and 20,000 tonnes of copra due to high offer prices, said an NLCF official said.
The official said the NLCF will re-invite tenders for the passed positions by 11:00 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Friday.
The NLCF bought 6,000 tonnes of rapeseed meal at $136.39 a tonne C&F from Peter Cremar and the remaining 9,000 tonnes from Cargill at the same price.
It also bought 6,500 tonnes of cottonseed meal at $157.90 a tonne C&F from South Korean trading house Sunkyong Ltd and 3,500 tonnes at $159.50 a tonne C&F from LG International Corp.
Details for the results are as follows:
COMMOD TONNES SELLER PRICE ETA ARRIVAL PORT
